prod_short_desc: Speed to the rescue with Jay’s Lightning Jet!
prod_long_desc:
Save Ed and Edna from the shark army’s crab with Jay’s Lightning Jet in this thrilling THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ set. The jet has a handle for easy pick-up-and-play and maximum swooshability, plus an opening minifigure cockpit, spring-loaded shooter and trigger-activated rotating electro-disc. The crab features posable legs, a snapping pincer and 6-stud rapid shooter, and the set also includes 6 minifigures with assorted weapons to dial up the role-play conflict.
Includes 6 minifigures: Jay, Ed, Edna, Crusty, Jelly and Shark Army Thug.
Lightning Jet features a handle for easy play, opening minifigure cockpit, spring-loaded shooter, trigger-activated rotating electro-disc, adjustable wings and lots of antennae.
Crab features 6 posable legs, a snapping pincer and a 6-stud rapid shooter.
Weapons include Jay's spiked flail, Crusty's fish chainsaw, Jelly's stud-shooter and fish with extra studs, and Shark Army Thug's fish hammer.
Also includes Ed's wrench element.
Recreate and role-play exciting THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ scenes.
Lightning Jet measures over 7” high, 17” long and 11” wide.
Crab measures over 2” high, 3” long and 4” wide.
